# uptimekuma_notification_apprise (Resource)

Apprise notification resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `apprise_url` (String, Sensitive) Apprise URL
- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `title` (String) Title for Apprise notification

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
